DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : compare efficacy tinidazole cefazolin prophylaxis febrile infectious morbidity vaginal abdominal hysterectomy . Methods : A randomized clinical trial carry Women 's Integrated Healthcare Center ( CAISM ) /UNICAMP , Campinas , Brazil . Women undergo total vaginal abdominal hysterectomy randomly enrol one three group antibiotic prophylaxis : tinidazole , cefazolin association .
DOC.brief_title: Tinidazole Versus Cefazolin Antibiotic Prophylaxis Vaginal Abdominal Hysterectomy
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized clinical trial carry Women 's Integrated Healthcare Center ( CAISM ) /UNICAMP , Campinas , Brazil , compare efficacy tinidazole cefazolin prophylaxis febrile infectious morbidity vaginal abdominal hysterectomy . Women undergo total vaginal abdominal hysterectomy randomly enrol one three group antibiotic prophylaxis : tinidazole , cefazolin association .
DOC.criteria: woman undergo hysterectomy due nononcologic cause previous pelvic infection antibiotic use within 7 day surgery study drug allergy immunoincompetence urinary tract infection
